Reviews.Title: Excellent picture quality
Reviews.Author: nightlatch
Reviews.Content: While the camera works and operates well, it didn't include a mounting base making it necessary to improvise a way to install it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD security camera, Color DSP
700 TV Lines horizontal resolution, NTSC System. OSD menu adjustment
Weatherproof outdoor housing, stand for use in all weather conditions, IP66, cable through bracket
Build-in 4-9mm zoom focus lens and 42 infrared leds for night vision
Package included: 1 x high resolution camera, 1 x power supply and 1 x security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Built-in 1/3" Sony Effio CCD Color DSP 700TVL High Resolution OSD Menu Day Night Vision Outdoor Bullet Security Camera 4-9mm Varifocal Lens 42 IR Infrared Illumination LEDs for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance with Power Supply and Security Warning Decal A29
